executive_summary:
RAG Analysis of AMZN based on 10-K ingestion. The company shows strong revenue of $383,285.00M and EBITDA of $13,472.80M. The implied valuation suggests a base target of $6.42. Key risks identified include: Intense competition in e-commerce and cloud computing.
Supply chain disruptions and logistics costs.
Regulatory scrutiny on marketplace practices.
Labor unionization efforts and workforce management.
...

sections.title: Business Overview
sections.content:
Item 1. Business
Amazon.com, Inc. engages in the retail sale of consumer products and subscriptions in North America and internationally. The company operates through three segments: North America, International, and Amazon Web Services (AWS).

Item 1A. Risk Factors
The following risk factors could materially affect our business, financial condition, or results of operations:
- Intense competition in e-commerce and cloud computing.
- Supply chain disruptions and logistics costs.
- Regulatory scr...

sections.title: Risk Factors
sections.content:
Intense competition in e-commerce and cloud computing.
Supply chain disruptions and logistics costs.
Regulatory scrutiny on marketplace practices.
Labor unionization efforts and workforce management.
Additional general economic risks including inflation and interest rates.
